teaser: This week’s episode featured an interview with Debbie Harry and Chris Stein, the creative forces behind the band Blondie. During the conversation, Rico talked with the duo about Chris’s book, “Chris Stein / Negative: Me, Blondie, and the Advent of Punk,” which features photos taken by Chris of the ’70s and ’80s New York rock scene. [{"content":"

This week’s episode featured an interview with Debbie Harry and Chris Stein, the creative forces behind the band Blondie. During the conversation, Rico talked with the duo about Chris’s book, “Chris Stein / Negative: Me, Blondie, and the Advent of Punk,” which features photos taken by Chris of the ’70s and ’80s New York rock scene. A few of the photos are on display through May 24th at the Paul Smith store in L.A. In this web extra, Rico talks with the two about a few rock legends captured in Chris’s photos… and about the time Milton Berle kissed Chris on the lips.

contentencoded: This week’s episode featured an interview with Debbie Harry and Chris Stein, the creative forces behind the band Blondie. During the conversation, Rico talked with the duo about Chris’s book, “Chris Stein / Negative: Me, Blondie, and the Advent of Punk,” which features photos taken by Chris of the ’70s and ’80s New York rock scene. A few of the photos are on display through May 24th at the Paul Smith store in L.A. In this web extra, Rico talks with the two about a few rock legends captured in Chris’s photos… and about the time Milton Berle kissed Chris on the lips.
title: Blondie’s Debbie Harry and Chris Stein Talk Rock History (Web Extra)
